body:
Challenge Title: MCSG'er / Hive'er
Challenge Ranking: Easy/INSANE
Challenge rating: ♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡ (0/10)
Rules:
  • Craft a fishing rod, and a flint and steel! (If possible)
  • Kill at least 3 Players using Both of those items (Including the sword)
  • Simple and eZ challenge
My thoughts:
    And eZ, but yet a little more challenging than normal :P.. Good luck I guess! And yes i know there arent many maps with cobweb, or gravel to make flint and steel or the fishing rod!

title: Avicus Challenges (Day 17) [Nebula]

replies.body:
Oh, the flint and steel on Rigor Mortis and Rendezvous 2 CTW used to wreak havoc... Ah, old times.

The challenging part of this is crafting both a flint and steel and a fishing rod in one map :P

replies.body: Ye.. thats basically the only challenge :P
